europeana:record.dc:title: Taxonomig review of the New Guinea subgenus Homoeopsopha Schürhoff of Ischiopsopha Gestro (Coleoptera: Cetoniidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Krikken J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
europeana:record.dc:description: The subgenus Homoeopsopha Schürhoff (stat. nov.) of Ischiopsopha Gestro is diagnosed and discussed. The 7 species are keyed, and a checklist is given; new records are given, a lectotype is designated, and one new species is described and figured: Ischiopsopha (Homoeopsopha) jansoni from New Guinea; the other species are briefly described.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Taxonomig review of the New Guinea subgenus Homoeopsopha Schürhoff of Ischiopsopha Gestro (Coleoptera: Cetoniidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 56) (Issue 4)
